Features

  • True TransparencySee your desktop, browser, or any app behind the floating text.
  • Auto-ScrollAdjustable scroll speed with play/pause. Use Space or F5 to toggle.
  • Rich Text EditingBold, italic, underline, highlights, lists, alignment, font size 16–72px.
  • Background ControlOpacity slider from 0% (invisible) to 100%. Color presets including green screen.
  • Click-Through ModeLock the window so mouse clicks pass through — only text floats on screen.
  • Always On TopStays above all windows while you record, present, or video call.

macOS users: On first launch, right-click the app → Open → click "Open" in the dialog.
The app is not notarized with Apple, so macOS will ask for confirmation once.

Windows users: SmartScreen may show a warning. Click "More info" → "Run anyway".
